item.title: How to Prevent CSS Hover State From Getting stuck on Mobile Browsers
item.description: Problem The CSS hover state often gets stuck on mobile (touch screen) browsers. It would be something like this: Click image to play GIF How to Fix It Using the ‘hover’ CSS media query, which could be applied either through SCSS or CSS. In the case of SCSS, we’re going to use a mixin. Here is each solution respectively: Solution 1: SCSS Mixin The mixin: @mixinhover-supported { @media (hover: hover) { @content; } } Example use:
